Posts.Content: I have been receiving Avastin along with paxlitaxal for the last year on a 1x weekly for 3 weeks 1 week off.  I am wondering if anyone else has had the side effect of lymphodema type swelling mainly in buttocks and thigh area and also ankle & foot.  My Dr. is attributing it to the avastin.   I have been through 6 weeks of massage therapy with little change.It is driving me crazy and was wondering if anyone had any suggestions
Posts.Title: neuropathy & swelling after avastin treatment
